mapper.select: SELECT p.project_id AS projectId, p.project_title AS projectTitle, e.emp_name AS empName, p.project_desc AS projectDesc, p.project_status AS projectStatus, p.start_date AS startDate, p.end_date AS endDate, pm.count AS projectMemberCount FROM project p INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM rank_history WHERE emp_id = #{searchList.empId} AND end_date IS NULL) rh ON p.pm_id = rh.emp_id INNER JOIN employee e ON e.emp_id = rh.emp_id INNER JOIN (SELECT project_id, COUNT(*) AS count FROM project_member GROUP BY project_id) pm ON p.project_id = pm.project_id ORDER BY startDate DESC;
